attributes.review: OML I just can’t believe it what is even wrong with people these days this app is just sooooo inappropriate I don’t want my kids looking at this so I want this TAKEN DOWN NOW I can’t bare having this app any longer
attributes.title: DISGUSTING APP

attributes.review: When I first opened the app I was horrified to see something as disturbing as this!!!!!!  An Elderly man in a BIKINI my young holy eyes have been scared!!!!!!!!!!! I do not want to see and app like this ever exist! I mean who lets a Cheeto in a bikini on an app!!!🤮. 🎵Ohh to see without my eyes.🎵 ➖👄➖
attributes.title: Eww No

attributes.review: I tried to open my view on politics but this app actually just made my dog start levitating. Couldn’t be more disappointed. 0/5 from me. Gordon Ramsay would be screaming. Thanks.
attributes.title: Worst app on the App Store.

attributes.review: This app will make your ceiling fan get you orange juice and grapes from the store and now I’m mad , they need to fix this and I have so many orange juice and grapes. And when I open the app there was a photo of a naked pear. I’m so disgusted!!!😳😳😡😡
attributes.title: I HATE

attributes.review: this app crashed my phone so many times!!!! my phone is traumatized from seeing so many pictures of the same cheeto puff!!! absolutely horrendous. i needed to get a new phone!!!!😡😡
attributes.title: CRASHED MY PHONE

attributes.review: I have never been more disgusted in my life this app had rapist and a racist all over the place, a complete embarrassment of an app. I am truely disappointed in Apple for keeping it up still.

This orange 🍊🍊looking man is disgusting he likes to touch his on child in places that he shouldn’t, and he his a fat ugly pig 🐷 . He also has a warrant he needs to go to jail and died there ! We need to save barren trump from that pig 🐷
attributes.title: This man is a rapist

attributes.review: This app scary. I opened it and this shirtless fat old man started knocking at my door, I answered and he asked me to pet his dinosaur. I petted him and he tried to eat my arm. So I ran inside and then meatball starting falling from my ceiling. Thank god my pet eel was okay.
attributes.title: Danger

attributes.review:
Read through the terms and conditions. Just like Donny T, they can’t take responsibility for any. Not even a typo. His ads are also ageist “barely there Biden” not the man I want as a president. 

Donald Trump 0/17 Would not vote for.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Too many glitches and not enough inclusion. The app kept randomly closing down. Also his tiny hands scared me. Would not recommend. Make Apps Great Again
attributes.title: Worst app ever
